duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead cross-functional, company-wide, and business unit specific process improvement initiatives using Lean Six Sigma, Project Management, Business Analysis, and change management disciplines.
Conduct organizational and business process analysis, prepare value stream mapping, and drive project planning activities for continuous improvement efforts.
Equip the organization with operational excellence tools and practices by applying Lean and Six Sigma methodology on a regular basis, facilitating knowledge transfer within the business units.
Lead high-impact process improvement projects by partnering with senior leaders to increase operational efficiency and reduce waste through Lean and Six Sigma tools.
Validate and scope improvement projects, link client requirements with business process improvements, and organize effective teams to deliver results.
Solve complex problems, integrate and interpret data from diverse sources, and monitor changes made to improve processes for long-term adoption.
Partner with business leaders to increase efficiencies and reduce waste within the organization, ensuring efforts produce expected financial results.
Bring innovation and insight by working closely with Business partners and being a trusted administrator to drive process improvement independently.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree - Preferred, 4 years of experience in Lean implementation, 1 year of experience in Six Sigma, LSS- Greenbelt - Required, LSS-Blackbelt - Preferred
